name: Acrobatics and Flips
description: Train in dynamic aerial movements that enhance agility, creativity, and control.

cards.title: Au (Capoeira Cartwheel)
cards.description: A fluid cartwheel-like motion used for evasion and attack positioning.
bulletpoints: Engage core muscles to maintain control
Land softly and prepare for follow-up moves

cards.title: Macaco (Back Handspring Variation)
cards.description: A backward acrobatic flip that develops explosive power and transitions.
bulletpoints: Push off with one arm for stability
Spot the ground for a controlled landing
